definition: Hui'an county in Quanzhou 泉州[Quan2 zhou1], Fujian
surname Hui
favor/benefit/to bestow/(literary) benevolence/(honorific)
surname An
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
Hui'an county in Quanzhou 泉州[Quan2 zhou1], Fujian

sentences.english: Huian female wearing the hats painted yellow paint, with the role of anti-sun and rain.
sentences.chinese: 惠安女头戴的斗笠涂上黄漆，具有防日晒雨淋作用。

sentences.english: A vast amount of stone buildings gestate the characteristic style and features of residential building in Huian coastal areas.
sentences.chinese: 大量的石构建筑形成了惠安沿海居民住宅的特殊风貌。

sentences.english: Nice houses in Hoi An old town, which decorate with plants on the roof.
sentences.chinese: 惠安古镇里的房子，都有花花草草装饰着，非常漂亮。

sentences.english: There are four categories of predicative sentences with repeated mono syllabic verbs in Hui'an dialect.
sentences.chinese: 惠安方言单音动词重叠谓语句主要有四类。

sentences.english: What is the life of today's Huian women?
sentences.chinese: 还有今天的惠安女生活会是怎样？

sentences.english: In recent years, recycling agriculture in Huian County has been expanded and developed constantly.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，福建省惠安县循环农业不断发展壮大。
